creator: Alexander Terp
description:
Let's make RLS help with functions, as that's one of the less easy parts of writing RSL atm.

Ideas:

* Error on unknown function names
* Error on invalid function usage (advanced)
* Offer code action when a function is highlighted to open reference page for said function

Implementation:

* We have `funcs.go` which nicely defines things about our functions. We can probably reuse this. A separate main which calls into this symbol, and just reads function metadata? Writes out e.g. function names to a file, that we can then build RLS with.
title: RAD-228: RLS: Better function help
